alert.note: Alert for Haakon; Northern Meade Co Plains; Northern Perkins; Southern Perkins; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 31 at 4:48AM MST until December 31 at 11:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Northern Perkins County, the Northern Meade County Plains, Ziebach County, Haakon County and Southern Perkins County. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Icy spots may develop on roadways.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low-beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Haakon; Northern Meade Co Plains; Northern Perkins; Southern Perkins; Ziebach
